update sysuser set userName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userPwd = #{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, roleSym = #{roleSym,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, roleName = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, personId = #{personId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, personName = #{personName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deptId = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deptName = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stts = #{stts,jdbcType=INTEGER}, descr = #{descr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select * from SysUser
deptId=#{deptId}
and personName like concat(concat('%',#{personName}),'%')
and userName like concat(concat('%',#{userName}),'%')
order by id
